thread.title: Mauna Kea Beach Hotel Concludes 50th Anniversary with 42nd Annual Pro-Am TournamentTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Mauna Kea Beach Hotel Concludes 50th Anniversary with 42nd Annual Pro-Am TournamentTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Mauna Kea Beach Hotel Concludes 50th Anniversary with 42nd Annual Pro-Am TournamentTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Mauna Kea Beach Hotel Concludes 50th Anniversary with 42nd Annual Pro-Am Tournament Published on : Saturday, August 29, 2015
The 50th anniversary of the iconic Mauna Kea Beach Hotel, Autograph Collection, comes to a close with the 42nd Annual Mauna Kea Pro-Am, December 2 to 7, 2015.
The course was first christened in 1964. Welcoming club professionals and amateurs alike, golfers can enjoy six days and five nights of championship golf, luxury accommodations, exquisite Hawaiian cuisine, prizes, and more.
“Our Robert Trent Jones Sr.-designed course has always proven challenging for all levels of golfers,” said Josh Silliman, Mauna Kea director of golf. “When the fairways were lengthened in 2008 by son Rees Jones and our 99 bunkers enlarged, the challenge continued, right along with all the special memories this legendary course provides.”
Pro-Am entry fees begin at $3,620 including taxes, accommodations for five nights, daily breakfast, practice and tournament rounds, special dinner events, hospitality room, amenity tournament gifts, and prizes. Airfare is also included for each team’s golf professional, who will compete for a professional prize-purse of $10,000, based on a full field of 25 teams.
In honor of the resort’s 50th anniversary, Pro-Am participants can take advantage of the following special offers: $50 parking and internet for the duration of a player’s stay, $50 golf guest fee for spouse, and $50 late checkout until 8 p.m. on the day of departure.
Source:- IAGTO
